pkgmetadata.longdescription: PH/MAP Parameter Estimation // Estimation methods for phase-type distribution (PH) and Markovian arrival process (MAP) from empirical data (point and grouped data) and density function. The tool is based on the following researches: Okamura et al. (2009) doi:10.1109/TNET.2008.2008750, Okamura and Dohi (2009) doi:10.1109/QEST.2009.28, Okamura et al. (2011) doi:10.1016/j.peva.2011.04.001, Okamura et al. (2013) doi:10.1002/asmb.1919, Horvath and Okamura (2013) doi:10.1007/978-3-642-40725-3_10, Okamura and Dohi (2016) doi:10.15807/jorsj.59.72.
